page.title: 02LOCAL GOVERNMENT & COMMERCE
page.content: Wymondham Town Council meets on the first Tuesday of every month and is composed of 15 councillors from the Conservative and Liberal/SDP Alliance, parties.There are no Labour members. Mrs. Ford is the town Mayor/chairman of the council. The town Mayor is elected every year from serving councillors. A study has been commissioned to define the council's functions which at present seem to be planning,recreation and leisure and some financial matters.The council also acts in a consultative capacity to the S.N.D.C. and the N.C.C. There is a thriving commercial base with an active Local Chamber of Trade, a relatively large industrial estate and smaller group of 'starter units' a good proportion of whose occupiers have been unsuccessful. Lotus cars are a significant employer.
